author: USA TODAY, Elizabeth Weise and David Heath, USA TODAY
title: 'Our moon shot': Vaccine makers go ahead with unproven candidates to meet 2021 goal – that experts say may be unrealistic
description: Developing a new vaccine typically takes many years, but pharmaceutical companies are trying to push one out in the next 12-18 months.
content:
President Trump said coronavirus won't be coming back in the fall, but Dr. Fauci believes otherwise, contradicting the president's statements.
USA TODAY
In a series of breathtaking multibillion-dollar bets by vaccine makers, possible candidates to fight the… [+8428 chars]
